Name: Michael
description: Michael is a married man. He has 3 children. He describes himself as a risk taker. He operates a business making jikos (cooking pots) and other items. He has been involved in this business for 10 years. His business is located in a busy area. He considers his biggest business challenge to be inadequate finances. He will use the KES 80,000 loan to buy more materials for making jikos. His business goal is to have an established business within 5 years. He hopes that he will have a bright future. This is his sixth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits from this loan to meet his family's needs.
